title: Start
body:
<<BG BG Backstage>>
<<outfit Aig Stage>>
<<outfit J-Pe Stage>>
<<outfit Lee Stage>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression Lee NOSF>>
<<expression J-Pe NOSF>>
<<flip Kent>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<name Friendship ...>>
<<size Dialogue 60>>
AAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!
<<size Dialogue 40>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
U-uh, thank you! Thank you everybody, but we REALLY need to get back to our dressing room!
<<name Friendship ...>>
<<size Dialogue 60>>
I LOVE YOU J-PE!!!
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<size Dialogue 40>>
I, uh...love you too.
<<size Dialogue 60>>
<<name Friendship ...>>
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!
<<size Dialogue 40>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Quick! Get in!
<<move Aig StageRight1>>
<<move J-Pe CenterStage>>
<<move Lee StageLeft2>>
*sigh* 
<<expression Aig NOSF>>
Finally.
<<move Fan StageRight2>>
<<name Friendship Fan>>
<<size Dialogue 60>>
<<expression Fan Smile>>
J-PE LET ME HAVE YOUR BABY!!!
<<size Dialogue 40>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<expression Aig RNWF>>
<<expression Lee RNWF>>
<<expression J-Pe RNWF>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe RNWF>>
Uh...
...o-okay.
<<name Friendship Fan>>
<<size Dialogue 60>>
AAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<size Dialogue 40>>
<<expression Lee AONF>>
Aigburth! The door!
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
R-right!
<<flip Aig>>
Uh...sorry! Thanks for coming to the show!
<<name Friendship Fan>>
<<size Dialogue 60>>
AAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHH!!!!!
<<size Dialogue 40>>
<<move Aig StageRight2>>
<<move Fan OffStageRight>>
<<name Friendship ...>>
*THUNK*
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
<<flip Aig>>
I can't believe this is happening.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
I can't believe I just agreed to be a father.
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe ROSF>>
Was that a weird thing to say.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
...
<<expression Lee NOSF>>
No. I think it's fine.
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
*sigh* Okay, good.
<<name Friendship ...>>
Having fun, boys?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Miss Kent!
<<move J-Pe StageRight1>>
<<move Lee CenterStage>>
<<move Kent StageLeft2>>
<<flip Lee>>
Miss Kent! It's CRAZY out there!
<<flip Aig>>
I don't know if they want to kiss me or kill me!
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RHNF>>
Eh.  Probably a little bit of both.
<<expression Kent RSNF>>
If we're lucky that is.
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
IF WE'RE LUCKY?!?
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Look boys, believe me when I say that I NEVER in a million years saw this coming...
<<expression Kent RSNF>>
...but you're a bonafide success my little bubbales!
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression aig ROWF>>
We are?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Ohhhhhh, yeah.
Just listen to them out there, they love you!
You're a sensation!
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe RLNF>>
I mean, I knew we would be but...
<<expression J-Pe NSNF>>
...I mean, this is insane, right?
<<expression Kent RSWF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
What's insane is that I've already got you guys an interview with PCN!
<<expression Kent RSNF>>
Am I killing it right now, or what?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
An interview? 
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Yup! It starts in about...
<<flip Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
...let me just check my watch...
<<flip Kent>>
<<expression Kent RSNF>>
...forty five seconds.
<<expression Lee RNWF>>
<<expression J-Pe RNWF>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
WHAT?!
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Things are moving fast people! Lot's of things to do.
We're on rocket ship that's about to take off and we've barely prepped the launch pad!
<<expression Kent NSNF>>
Now, ya'll better get ready.  The girl from PCN will be here any second!
<<expression Kent NSNB>>
<<flip Kent>>
Smooches!
<<expression kent NSNF>>
<<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
An interview?! Now?!
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<flip Kent>>
We've barely even gotten off stage!
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe RLNF>>
You heard Kimmy.  We're stars!
<<expression J-Pe RHSF>>
This is life in the fast lane, Aiggy.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNB>>
I-I guess so.
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
OH!
<<move Kent StageLeft2>>
I almost forgot!
Here.
<<unlock Unlocks XIX>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig ROSF>>
Uh...what is this?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
It's the name of the band!
It's spelled X-I-X, see?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Um...kind of?
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
This box says "X-I-X?"
<<vanish Unlocks>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Don't think about it too hard.
Now If you'll excuse me, I have about a thousand calls to make.
<<flip Kent>>
<<expression Kent NSNB>>
Have fun with the interview!
<<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
<<move Lee StageLeft2>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<move J-Pe CenterStage>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNSF>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
XIX, huh.
Is that a word I don't know?
<<flip J-Pe>>
Am I missing something here?
<<name Friendship ...>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<flip Aig>>
*KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK*
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
That must be the interview...er.
<<move Lee CenterStage>>
<<move J-Pe StageLeft1>>
<<move Aig StageLeft2>>
<<move Gabby StageRight2>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<exprssion Lee NNNF>>
<<name Friendship Gabby>>
*whew* Sorry, I'm late.
<<flip Gabby>>
I had to drop kick, like, six teenage girls to get in here.
<<flip Gabby>>
<<expression Gabby Happy>>
Anyway, I'm Gabby Garrity, Paradiso Cable News, Entertainment Division.
Pleasure to meet you guys!
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe NLNF>>
Pleasure's all ours!
<<name Friendship Gabby>>
<<expression Gabby Neutral>>
Before we start, I just wanted to say; I caught the end of the show...
<<expression Gabby Happy>>
...you guys are OMG craze-mazing awesomesauce!
<<name Friendship Lee>>
My words exactly.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig RLNF>>
Th-thanks!
<<name Friendship Gabby>>
Awesome.
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression Gabby Neutral>>
Okay, so brass tax, guys. Where you from? What do you do? Where are you going? What's going oooooon?
I want ALL the deets.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
Oh gee, uh...where to start.
<<name Friendship Gabby>>
Well let's start at the beginning, m'kay? 
Who are you guys?
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe NSNF>>
Well...
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression Aig NSNF>>
...
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<expression Lee NSNF>>
...
<<flip Lee>>
<<expression Lee NLNF>>
<<expression Aig NLNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NLNF>>
We're XIX!
<<name Friendship Gabby>>
<<expression Gabby Happy>>
Great!
<<expression Gabby Neutral>>
And what does that stand for?
<<expression Lee NNWF>>
<<expression Aig NNWF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNWF>>
<<name Friendship ...>>
...
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNWB>>
...uhhhhhh.
